popt4jlib.neural

Class TrainData

  • java.lang.Object
    • popt4jlib.neural.TrainData

  • final class TrainData
extends java.lang.Object
    Auxiliary class that serves as a place-holder for caching data for training neural networks, and making them available via static method calls. Not part of the public API.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2020

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
